learn.title: Learn Macedonian

learn.modulesIntro: Build skills across vocabulary, grammar, phrases, and pronunciation with focused modules.
learn.vocabularyDesc: Learn essential Macedonian words and phrases
learn.grammarDesc: Master Macedonian grammar rules and structures
learn.quickPracticeDescription: Test yourself with bite-sized translation prompts.

learnVocabulary.title: Vocabulary Foundations
learnVocabulary.subtitle: Grow your Macedonian vocabulary through high-frequency themes and intentional review.
objectives: Master 120+ high-frequency Macedonian words across daily topics.
Pair Macedonian words with clear English meanings and sample sentences.
Build a review habit using spaced repetition and mini quizzes.

everyday.title: Everyday Essentials
everyday.description: Core words for greetings, numbers, food, and directions.
items: Food, drinks, shopping, and money basics

situational.title: Situational Sets
situational.description: Targeted vocabulary for travel, work, and study scenarios.

expansion.title: Expansion Decks
expansion.description: Broaden your vocabulary with synonyms, antonyms, and collocations.
items: Topic-based word families with example sentences
Mini quizzes that combine new and review words

activities.title: Spaced Flashcards
activities.description: Review 15 words per day using a spaced repetition deck. Say each word aloud and write a short personal sentence.

activities.title: Category Sprints
activities.description: Pick one topic, set a five-minute timer, and list as many Macedonian words as you can. Compare with the answer sheet afterward.

activities.title: Conversation Swap
activities.description: Create a short dialogue that uses at least five target words. Practice with a partner or record yourself for playback.

resources.title: Dictionaries
resources.description: Browse bilingual dictionaries and reference tools.

resources.title: For learners
resources.description: YouTube channels and podcasts tailored for Macedonian learners.

resources.title: Macedonian Language
resources.description: Video lessons and cultural clips to reinforce new words.

learnGrammar.title: Grammar Building Blocks
learnGrammar.subtitle: Understand how Macedonian sentences work by focusing on structure, cases, and verb aspect.
objectives: Review sentence structure and word order for statements and questions.
Learn case endings for definite nouns and pronouns.
Contrast imperfective and perfective verbs in everyday contexts.

structure.title: Sentence Structure
structure.description: Create accurate statements, questions, and negations.
items: Word order patterns for subject, verb, and object

cases.title: Cases & Articles
cases.description: Understand Macedonian definite endings and object pronouns.
items: Definite article endings by gender and number
Common prepositions and the case they require

verbs.title: Verb Aspect
verbs.description: Use imperfective vs. perfective verbs to signal progress or completion.
items: Present, past, and future conjugation review

activities.title: Sentence Scramble
activities.description: Rebuild shuffled word cards into a correct Macedonian sentence. Say it aloud, then convert it into a question.

activities.title: Case Drill
activities.description: Write three mini-dialogues that use direct and indirect objects. Highlight the endings and pronouns you choose.

activities.title: Aspect Journal
activities.description: Describe yesterday's actions twice: once with imperfective verbs for context, and once with perfective verbs for outcomes.

resources.title: Macedonian dictionary
resources.description: Look up declensions and verb forms in the official dictionary.

resources.title: DW на македонски
resources.description: Read clear news prose to see sentence patterns in context.

resources.title: Архангел
resources.description: Dive into language reference articles and literary archives.

learnPhrases.title: Conversation Phrases
learnPhrases.subtitle: Practice set phrases and build confidence for real-world interactions.
objectives: Deliver natural introductions and polite exchanges.
Handle travel and logistics scenarios with ready-made phrases.
Respond to invitations, plans, and social cues.

introductions.title: Introductions
introductions.description: Start conversations smoothly and share personal details.
items: Talking about family, work, and hobbies
Inviting people to continue the conversation

travel.title: Travel Toolkit
travel.description: Navigate transport, lodging, and dining situations.
items: Buying tickets and asking for schedules
Ordering food and handling the bill

social.title: Social Flow
social.description: Keep conversations going and respond gracefully.

activities.title: Role-Play Cards
activities.description: Pair up and act out a scenario card. Swap roles and add new phrases each round.

activities.title: Shadowing
activities.description: Listen to a native recording and repeat in sync. Focus on rhythm, intonation, and filler phrases.

activities.title: Phrase Builder
activities.description: Choose a phrase and extend it in three different directions (formal, friendly, humorous).

resources.title: Media
resources.description: TV and radio clips to practice real conversations.

resources.title: Podcasts
resources.description: Long-form discussions ideal for listening and phrasing.

resources.title: Што го врти светот
resources.description: Conversational videos with natural pacing and slang.

learnPronunciation.title: Pronunciation Lab
learnPronunciation.subtitle: Tune your ear and mouth to Macedonian sounds, stress patterns, and connected speech.
objectives: Produce Macedonian vowels and consonant clusters clearly.
Place stress correctly within common word families.
Improve listening comprehension with minimal pairs and dictations.

sounds.title: Sound Inventory
sounds.description: Map Macedonian vowels, consonants, and tricky clusters.

stress.title: Stress & Melody
stress.description: Hear and reproduce natural stress patterns.
items: Track stress shifts in conjugations and plurals
Use intonation to signal questions and emphasis

listening.title: Listening Lab
listening.description: Sharpen your ear with minimal pairs and micro-dictations.
items: Mouth-shape mimicry with mirror or recording

activities.title: Mirror Drills
activities.description: Record yourself reading a short passage, compare with a native sample, and note mouth shape adjustments.

activities.title: Stress Mapping
activities.description: Highlight stressed syllables in five new words each day, then read them aloud in a sentence.

activities.title: Dictation Bursts
activities.description: Play a ten-second clip, write down what you hear, and check against the transcript.

resources.title: Makedonkast
resources.description: Audio-first lessons that focus on pronunciation and rhythm.

resources.title: Media
resources.description: Newsroom clips to imitate stress and cadence.

resources.title: Podcasts
resources.description: Practice minimal pairs and connected speech with spoken shows.
